name: Asha Health
headline: We help medical practices launch their own AI clinic
description: Asha Health enables medical practices to launch their own AI clinic, designed to fill crucial care gaps that their brick & mortar clinics are too overburdened to address — all while generating additional revenue on autopilot.

founders.name: Akkshay Khoslaa, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CEO @ Asha Health. Previously: led a portfolio of genAI products at Google, founded a community of 250+ healthcare innovators, developed 0-1 products at Facebook, and studied EECS @ UC Berkeley.

founders.name: Gokul Kumarresen, Founder
founders.description: Co-Founder & CTO @ Asha Health. Previously: led Growth Engineering projects & new initiatives at Brex; built secure data-transfer tools for highly regulated environments, like Government Cloud, at Salesforce.

generated_description:
Asha Health is an innovative health-tech startup based in New York, founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch F24. Their mission is clear: they empower medical practices to launch their own AI clinics. This model is designed to address critical care gaps that traditional clinics struggle to manage due to high patient volumes, all while generating revenue effortlessly and on autopilot.

With a lean team of just two employees, Asha Health is making waves in the healthcare sector. Under the guidance of Group Partner Nicolas Dessaigne, the company is focused on converting existing medical practices into AI-driven ones. Essentially, they offer a way to enhance patient care without overwhelming the healthcare providers.

Asha Health’s solution helps practices achieve six types of return on investment (ROI) with minimal effort from staff, such as boosting care delivery margins and decreasing provider burdens. They focus on scaling access to care, managing entire patient populations, and lowering readmission rates—all under the umbrella of AI-enabled concierge care, which is even covered by insurance.

The company has already attracted over 100 physicians across various specialties, indicating a growing trust in this AI-supported healthcare paradigm. If you're curious to see how Asha Health might transform your practice, they encourage prospective partners to request a demo on their website, [asha.health](https://asha.health).

In short, Asha Health exemplifies how technology, particularly AI, can redefine healthcare delivery by improving efficiency and patient engagement—all while alleviating the pressures on medical staff. It’s a small but impactful step toward a future where healthcare is not only accessible but also proactive and tailored to individual needs.
